metadata.description: TURING — Autonomous State Machine for Cognitive Continuity. A Claude Code plugin by Agenisea AI™.

plugins.name: turing
plugins.description: Autonomous state machine for cognitive continuity. Preserves session state before context compaction and restores it on session start. Features priority-based selective restore, token budget tracking, auto decision extraction, and state archiving. Based on Alan Turing's 1936 paper 'On Computable Numbers'.
